document_data.caption: A set of hunting knives.
document_data.name: Hunting Knife
document_data.mainbody: '''Hunting knives''' were tools sometimes used by [[ranger]]s or woodsmen throughout [[Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Description: Hunting knives were available for a wide variety of applications to include serrated blades, hooked blades, bellied blades, etc.
document_data.History:
Hunting knives were used either for killing prey, or skinning or butchering the prey after it was slain. They could also be used as weapons.

A set of five hunting knives of various lengths were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' for 12 [[gold piece]]s.
